mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_activity (activity_name, activity_desc, activity_date, location, max_participants, current_participants, organizer_id, cover_image, status) VALUES (#{activityName}, #{activityDesc}, #{activityDate}, #{location}, #{maxParticipants}, #{currentParticipants}, #{organizerId}, #{coverImage}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_activity ORDER BY activity_date DESC
SELECT * FROM tb_activity WHERE status = #{status} ORDER BY activity_date DESC
SELECT * FROM tb_activity WHERE status = 1 AND activity_date >= NOW() ORDER BY activity_date ASC
